name: mapbox-gl-custom-source
description: mapbox-gj js custom SourceType - usage example

scripts.build: browserify -s mapboxgl index.js -d --plugin [minifyify --map mapbox-gl-custom-source.js.map --output dist/mapbox-gl-custom-source.js.map] -o dist/mapbox-gl-custom-source.js

author: Oscar Fonts <oscar.font@geomati.co>
